Title: BERNEY Swiss Mini Pocket PENDANT WATCH Gold Overlay
Description: BERNEY Swiss Mini Pocket PENDANT WATCH Gold Overlay Swedemom is proud to present this Gold Overlay Mini Pocket WATCH PENDANT by Berney of Switzerland. One of the premier Swiss watch making families, BERNEY has been manufacturing timepieces of exceptional quality for many years. These exquisite pieces (both Cases and Movement) are manufactured and assembled entirely at the factory in La Vallee' de Joux in Switzerland. The golden 22mm dial (face) is engraved with a floral pattern. It is signed "Berney" and "Swiss Made". It has black Roman numerals, and black hour and minute hands. The 26mm gold overlay case is engraved with a floral pattern on the back. This Brand New, battery operated watch is an heirloom quality timepiece that will be enjoyed for many years to come. Charity.Mission: MacHub is a division of Yamhill County Gospel Rescue Mission. MacHub partners with YCGRM to provide needed shelter, support, hope, and job opportunities. MacHub is changing community fund-raising by facilitating the sale of high-value contributions and passing proceeds on to nonprofits in the community. We thank our supporters and we welcome your ongoing support of our efforts!
